name: Tom's Tower Defense
description:
A not-so-classic Tower Defense that features new interesting mechanics. Don't expect to idle when waves of enemies are breaching down your base!
Expand your territory with the Electric Poles in order to gain victory!

This game includes an in-game Level Editor! You can send your creations to the developer via the credits.

Current enemies are:
-Soldiers (Green, Dark Green, Chef)
-Medic Soldier
-Shield Soldier
-Mobile Active Defense System
-Green Tank
-Plane
Current turrets are:
-Sentry Turret
-Missile Launcher
-Sniper Turret
-Military Base

Each turret contains 2 abilities, it's up to you to combine them between your turrets.

Please mind that the game is still in Alpha phase, and made by one guy in highschool as a hobby.
